nodes.text: The Ovise Reach was a hyperlane in the Outer Rim Territories Moddell sector that passed between the Monsua Nebula and Din Nebula. It connected the planet Endor to Zorbia and then Zorbia to Trindello before carrying on toward the edge of the sector. Endor acted as a junction from the Ovise Reach onto the Sanctuary Pipeline.

The Ovise Reach was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 18. It originated in the Star Wars Legends coninuity, where it was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
